name: Soulstream Expansive 2: Future Fate
description:
The Soulstream epic continues with part 2, to the Soulstream Expansive saga!

This game is a hodgepodge of whatever the fuck I wanna make, and it has expansion.

But on a more serious note, 

This is Soulstream Expansive 2: Future fate, 

Years after the evil Serenity has taken over as absolute monarch of the world, our main protagonist Luca is barely scraping by. Having avoided the watchful gaze of Serenity, or perchance just being ignored as a non-threat he is. 

Luca finds himself down on life. He knows he must fix this, he knows he must find a way to bring the tyranny down. But Luca is also aware he is but one person. Recruiting a team of willing and capable ladies and friends Luca will mount a resistance to try and fight his way back to equality. 

If such a thing could still exist. 

Can he change fate for the rest of the world or is he destined to be squished, crushed and used as a footrest for the large crowd around him?

WARNING: 

-This game is in extremely early development and meant to give you a taste of what I've been working on.  This is a scene select, in which you can try out some things I want to incorporate into the game. 

(Images are from the paid, up to date version (Available via patreon). 

-The game ends when you reach the homes in the forest area, there is no ending yet.

-I know things are buggy, no worries, I will be continuously working on this game :D

-If you would like to support development please join the patreon! In which you can get up to date updates on the game and get the latest features and scenes added! As soon as I make them!

Luca from the SoulStream is creating The SoulStream Expansive ( Inflation Games) | Patreon

-If you would like to join the discord for up to date info, here you go!

https://discord.gg/64bQBNBVeV
